text: Acalypha lepinei is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to French Polynesia. ==References== * Florence, J. 1998. Acalypha lepinei. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. title: Acalypha lepinei
